# controlPointStride

**Instance Property**

The stride, in bytes, between control points in the buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var controlPointStride: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The stride needs to be a multiple of the format element size you configure with the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAccelerationStructureCurveGeometryDescriptor/controlPointFormat] property, and at least the format’s size. The default value is `0`, which indicates that the control point elements in the buffer have zero bytes of padding between them.
